MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA9 and WA10 postcode of St Helens, affecting properties in a widespread area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because the emergency services are working with the gas board following evidence of a gas leak and have restricted access to our substation. Our engineers are on site and when it is safe for them to enter we will be able to commence restoring supplies. We expect the power to be restored by 3:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:45pm 22nd January 2021
